alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Massac; Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 8:27PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Massac, Pope, southeastern Johnson, northwestern Livingston and north central McCracken Counties through 900 PM CST... At 826 PM CST, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from New Columbia to near Metropolis. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Columbia around 830 PM CST. Metropolis around 835 PM CST. Dixon Springs around 840 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Golconda. This includes Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 20 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
